mapper.select: SELECT ss.round_num AS sessionNo, DATE_FORMAT(MIN(p.joined_at), '%Y-%m-%dT%H:%i:%s') AS joinAt, DATE_FORMAT(MAX(p.left_at), '%Y-%m-%dT%H:%i:%s') AS leaveAt FROM study_schedule ss JOIN meeting_room mr ON mr.subject_id = ss.subject_id AND mr.schedule_id = ss.schedule_id LEFT JOIN meetingroom_participant p ON p.room_id = mr.room_id AND p.user_email = #{userEmail} WHERE ss.subject_id = #{studyRoomId} GROUP BY ss.round_num ORDER BY ss.round_num

SELECT p.user_email AS memberId, p.user_email AS name, ss.round_num AS sessionNo, DATE_FORMAT(MIN(p.joined_at), '%Y-%m-%dT%H:%i:%s') AS joinAt, DATE_FORMAT(MAX(p.left_at), '%Y-%m-%dT%H:%i:%s') AS leaveAt FROM study_schedule ss JOIN meeting_room mr ON mr.subject_id = ss.subject_id AND mr.schedule_id = ss.schedule_id JOIN meetingroom_participant p ON p.room_id = mr.room_id WHERE ss.subject_id = #{studyRoomId} GROUP BY p.user_email, ss.round_num ORDER BY p.user_email, ss.round_num
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(start_time, '%H:%i') AS start, DATE_FORMAT(end_time, '%H:%i') AS end FROM study_schedule WHERE subject_id = #{studyRoomId} ORDER BY round_num ASC LIMIT 1
